articles.content: "It is a quiet enough chamber that protects aircraft and other GPS users outside of the facility," NTS-3 program manager Ariel Biersgreen said in the same statement. "We needed to have a shielded are… [+1191 chars]

articles.title: Scientists Solve Colorful Kuiper Belt Mystery - SciTechDaily
articles.description: The Kuiper Belt, a vast disk brimming with icy bodies including Pluto and located just beyond Neptune's orbit in our solar system, exhibits an intriguing color palette ranging from stark white to deep reddish hues on its objects. This distinctive color range,…
